content: Is there an automated way to determine conformance with the IG? We're likely using Crucible for our testing, which verifies the FHIR Server using the Capability Statement. Will it also determine if it is in conformance with the IG, e.g. in what must be searched, profiles that must be supported, etc.?

The Touchstone FHIR Testing platform has tests for Formulary. It has profile validation and a series of tests around the supported searches, etc. They can be found here: https://touchstone.aegis.net/touchstone/testdefinitions?selectedTestGrp=/FHIR4-0-1-PatientAccess/Pharm-Formulary&activeOnly=true&contentEntry=TEST_SCRIPTS
